year.title: Year
year.description: The ending year of the tax year to which the calculation relates, in the format YYYY. For example, tax year 2016 to 2017 is expressed as 2017. Value must be between 2016 and 2999.

intentToCrystallise.title: Intent To Crystallise
intentToCrystallise.description: Shows if this calculation is provided with the intent to crystallise. The default is FALSE

crystallised.title: Crystallised
crystallised.description: Shows if the calculation has been performed on the crystallised position. The default is FALSE

validationMessageCount.title: Validation Message Count
validationMessageCount.description: The quantity of validation messages encountered during the calculation.

incomeTaxAndNicYTD.title: Income Tax And Nic YTD
incomeTaxAndNicYTD.description: The Income Tax and National Insurance contributions due, based on year-to-date figures. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places. This field will not be displayed if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation

nationalRegime.title: National Regime
nationalRegime.description: Defines which national tax rates and rules to apply to the calculation. Must be one of: UK, Scotland, Wales. This field will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

taxableIncome.description: This object analyses how taxable income is derived. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The total income from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalPay.title: Total Pay
totalPay.description: The total net pay from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalBenefitsAndExpenses.title: Total Benefits And Expenses
totalBenefitsAndExpenses.description: The total benefits and expenses from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAllowableExpenses.title: Total Allowable Expenses
totalAllowableExpenses.description: The total allowable expenses from all employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netPay.title: Net Pay
netPay.description: The year-to-date net pay for this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

benefitsAndExpenses.title: Benefits And Expenses
benefitsAndExpenses.description: The benefits and expenses relating to this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

allowableExpenses.title: Allowable Expenses
allowableExpenses.description: The allowable expenses relating to this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

selfEmployments.description: This object summarises income for all self-employment sources

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The total income from all self-employments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

selfEmployment.description: Provides the taxable income for each individual self-employment

selfEmploymentId.title: Self-Employment ID
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income from this self-employment business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been finalised.

losses.title: Losses
losses.description: Any loss from this self-employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

ukProperty.description: This object summarises the UK property income sources

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The total income from all UK property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.title: Non-Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Profit
nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.description: Taxable profit from UK non-furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.title: Non-Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Loss
nonFurnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.description: Loss from UK non-furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

furnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.title: Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Profit
furnishedHolidayLettingsTaxableProfit.description: Taxable profit from UK furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

furnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.title: Furnished Holiday Lettings Taxable Loss
furnishedHolidayLettingsLoss.description: Loss from UK furnished holiday lettings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK property income has been finalised.

savings.title: Savings
savings.description: This object summarises interest from UK banks, building societies and securities

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The taxable amount of interest from UK banks, building societies and securities. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxedAccounts.title: Taxed Accounts
taxedAccounts.description: An array of savings accounts where interest has had tax deducted

gross.title: Gross
gross.description: The gross interest for the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

savingsAccountId.title: Savings Account ID
savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account

name.title: Name
name.description: Friendly account name. The account name must be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Allowed characters, including spaces are: mixed case alphanumeric characters and the characters; &'()*,-./@£

net.title: Net
net.description: The net interest for the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.title: Tax Deducted
taxDeducted.description: The tax deducted from the savings account (gross minus net). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxedInterestIncome.title: Total Taxed Interest Income
totalTaxedInterestIncome.description: Total gross interest from all taxed savings accounts. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalUntaxedInterestIncome.title: Total Untaxed Interest Income
totalUntaxedInterestIncome.description: Total interest from all untaxed savings accounts. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

untaxedAccounts.title: Untaxed Accounts
untaxedAccounts.description: An array of savings accounts where no tax has been deducted

gross.title: Gross
gross.description: The gross interest for the savings account. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

savingsAccountId.title: Savings Account ID
savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account

name.title: Name
name.description: Friendly account name. The account name must be between 1 and 32 characters in length. Allowed characters, including spaces are: mixed case alphanumeric characters and the characters; &'()*,-./@£

ukDividends.description: This object summarises the UK dividends income

totalIncome.title: Total Income
totalIncome.description: The total income from all UK dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherUkDividends.title: Other UK Dividends
otherUkDividends.description: The total dividend payments received from other UK dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

ukDividends.title: UK Dividends
ukDividends.description: The total dividend payments received from UK companies. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalIncomeReceived.title: Total Income Received
totalIncomeReceived.description: The total income received for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

allowancesAndDeductions.description: This object summarises the allowances and adjustments for the Tax Year

totalAllowancesAndDeductions.title: Total Allowances And Deductions
totalAllowancesAndDeductions.description: The total of all allowances and deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.title: Gift Of Investments And Property To Charity
giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.description: Investments and/or property gifts made to charity. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

apportionedPersonalAllowance.title: Apportioned Personal Allowance
apportionedPersonalAllowance.description: The amount of the annual personal allowance that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalTaxableIncome.title: Total Taxable Income
totalTaxableIncome.description: The total taxable income (income less allowances and deductions). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTax.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

totalIncomeTax.title: Total Income Tax
totalIncomeTax.description: The total calculated Income Tax after allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalBeforeReliefs.title: Total Before Reliefs
totalBeforeReliefs.description: The total Income Tax before allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAfterReliefs.title: Total After Reliefs
totalAfterReliefs.description: The total Income Tax after allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The total income subject to Income Tax calculation. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

payAndPensionsProfit.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation in relation to pay, pensions and profit.

totalAmount.title: Total Amount
totalAmount.description: The total amount of income tax associated with pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

band.description: The banding array shows the tax bands applicable to an Income Tax category. Only bands applicable to the calculation will be generated. (e.g. a BRT taxpayer will not have bands for HRT and ART). There will always be a minimum of 1 band if the array exists. The array will be populated in ascending order of the tax bands.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of: SRT, BRT, IRT, HRT, ART

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold
apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

income.title: Income
income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

apportionedBandLimit.title: Apportioned Band Limit
apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

bandLimit.title: Band Limit
bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used
personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with pay and pensions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

savingsAndGains.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation in relation to savings and gains.

totalAmount.title: Total Amount
totalAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

band.description: The banding array shows the tax banding applicable to an Income Tax category. Only bands applicable to the calculation will be generated. (e.g a BRT taxpayer will not have bands for HRT and ART). There will always be a minimum of 1 band if the array exists. The array will be populated in ascending order of the tax bands.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of the following: SSR,BRT,HRT,ART, ZRTBR, ZRTHR

oneOf.description: personal savings allowance awarded at basic rate
personal savings allowance awarded at higher rate

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold
apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

income.title: Income
income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

apportionedBandLimit.title: Apportioned Band Limit
apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

bandLimit.title: Band Limit
bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used
personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with savings and gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

dividends.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation in relation to dividends

totalAmount.title: Total Amount
totalAmount.description: The total amount of Income Tax associated with dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

band.description: The banding array shows the tax banding applicable to an Income Tax category. Only bands applicable to the calculation will be generated (for example a BRT taxpayer will not have bands for HRT and ART). There will always be a minimum of 1 band if the array exists. The array will be populated in ascending order of the tax bands.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of the following: BRT, HRT, ART, ZRTBR, ZRTHR, ZRTAR

oneOf.description: dividend allowance awarded at basic rate
dividend allowance awarded at higher rate
dividend allowance awarded at additional rate

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold
apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

income.title: Income
income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

apportionedBandLimit.title: Apportioned Band Limit
apportionedBandLimit.description: The apportioned threshold for the tax band, excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

bandLimit.title: Band Limit
bandLimit.description: The upper threshold for the tax band excluding personal allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

personalAllowanceUsed.title: Personal Allowance Used
personalAllowanceUsed.description: The amount of the apportioned annual personal allowance that has been offset against dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The taxable income associated with dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

allowancesAndReliefs.description: This object details the allowances and reliefs used in the income tax calculation

propertyFinanceRelief.title: Property Finance Relief
propertyFinanceRelief.description: The relief against property finance costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAllowancesAndReliefs.title: Total Allowances And Reliefs
totalAllowancesAndReliefs.description: The total amount of allowances and reliefs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

giftAid.description: This object shows the amount of Income tax associated to the amount of Gift Aid being declared. The actual Gift Aid benefit itself is reflected as a rate band extension (see annualAllowances.giftAidExtender).

paymentsMade.title: Payments Made
paymentsMade.description: The total amount of Gift Aid payments made for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The basic rate of tax that applies to Gift Aid. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.

taxableAmount.title: Taxable Amount
taxableAmount.description: The taxable amount of the Gift Aid payments made. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAfterGiftAid.title: Total After Gift Aid
totalAfterGiftAid.description: The total Income Tax after Gift Aid. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

residentialFinanceCosts.description: This object gives a breakdown of the income tax calculation in relation to residential finance costs

amountClaimed.title: Amount Claimed
amountClaimed.description: The amount being claimed including any carry forward amounts

allowableAmount.title: Allowable Amount
allowableAmount.description: The lower of: finance costs not deducted, property business profits, adjusted total income (exceeding Personal Allowance)

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The tax rate used for the calculation. The value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic.description: This object defines the National Insurance Contributions involved in the calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

totalNic.title: Total NIC
totalNic.description: The calculated amount of National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

class2.description: This object defines the Class 2 NIC elements of the calculation

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

weekRate.title: Week Rate
weekRate.description: The weekly rate for Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

weeks.title: Weeks
weeks.description: The number of weeks applied to calculate Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value is a whole number in the range 0 to 52.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The annual limit of Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

apportionedLimit.title: Apportioned Limit
apportionedLimit.description: The apportioned amount of annual Class 2 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

class4.description: This object defines the Class 4 NIC elements of the calculation

totalAmount.title: Total Amount
totalAmount.description: The calculated amount of Class 4 National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

band.description: The banding array shows the banding applicable to NIC Class 4. Only bands applicable to the calculation will be generated. There will always be a minimum of 1 band if the array exists.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tax band. Must be one of: BRT, HRT, ZRT

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: The rate associated with the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99.99.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The upper threshold for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

apportionedThreshold.title: Apportioned Threshold
apportionedThreshold.description: The amount of the upper threshold that has been apportioned. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

income.title: Income
income.description: The amount of taxable income for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The calculated amount of Income Tax for the tax band. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalBeforeTaxDeducted.title: Total Before Tax Deducted
totalBeforeTaxDeducted.description: The subtotal of Income Tax and National Insurance before tax is deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxDeducted.description: This object details the tax deductions that apply to the calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

totalTaxDeducted.title: Total Tax Deducted
totalTaxDeducted.description: The total amount of Income Tax and National Insurance that has been deducted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

savings.title: Savings
savings.description: Tax deducted from interest received from UK banks and building societies. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

ukLandAndProperty.title: UK Land And Property
ukLandAndProperty.description: Tax that has been deducted for UK land and property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

eoyEstimate.description: This object details the End of Year estimate for Income Tax. It will only be populated for in-year calculations; it will not be populated as part of a crystallisation calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

employments.description: An array of annualised estimated income for each employment

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from this employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether the employment income has been supplied or calculated. If true, the employment income has been supplied. If false, the employment income has been calculated.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the employment income has been finalised.

selfEmployments.description: An array of annualised estimated income for each self employment business

selfEmploymentId.title: Self-Employment ID
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from this self-employment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been supplied or calculated. If true, the self-employment income has been supplied. If false, the self-employment income has been calculated.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether this self-employment income has been finalised.

ukProperty.description: An object of annualised estimated income for a UK property business

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from UK property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether the UK property income has been supplied or calculated. If true, UK property income has been supplied. If false, the UK property income has been calculated.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK property income has been finalised.

ukDividends.description: An object of annualised estimated income for UK dividends

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated taxable income from UK dividends. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether the UK dividend income has been supplied or calculated. If true, UK dividend income has been supplied. If false, the UK dividend income has been calculated.

finalised.title: Finalised
finalised.description: Shows whether the UK dividend income has been finalised.

savings.description: An array of annualised estimated income  from UK banks, building societies and securities

savingsAccountId.title: Savings Account ID
savingsAccountId.description: The unique identifier of the savings account

taxableIncome.title: Taxable Income
taxableIncome.description: The estimated annual income from UK banks, building societies and securities. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

supplied.title: Supplied
supplied.description: Shows whether the interest from UK banks, building societies and securities has been supplied or calculated.  If true, the amount has been supplied. If false, the amount has been calculated

totalTaxableIncome.title: Total Taxable Income
totalTaxableIncome.description: The total estimated taxable income from all income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxAmount.title: Income Tax Amount
incomeTaxAmount.description: The estimated amount of Income Tax. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic2.title: NIC 2
nic2.description: The estimated amount of Class 2 National Insurance contributions, net of deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nic4.title: NIC 4
nic4.description: The estimated amount of Class 4 National Insurance contributions, net of deductions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalNicAmount.title: Total NIC Amount
totalNicAmount.description: The total estimated amount of National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

incomeTaxNicAmount.title: Income Tax And NIC Amount
incomeTaxNicAmount.description: The total estimated amount of Income Tax and National Insurance contributions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

calculationMessageCount.title: Calculation Message Count
calculationMessageCount.description: The quantity of warning/information messages for the calculation.

calculationMessages.description: An array of messages to provide additional context to the calculation

type.title: Type
type.description: The message type. Must be one of: warning information

annualAllowances.description: This object defines the annual allowances used in the calculation. This object will not be present if a business validation failure occurred processing the tax calculation.

personalAllowance.title: Personal Allowance
personalAllowance.description: The annual amount of personal allowance available for the tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

personalAllowanceThreshold.title: Personal Allowance Threshold
personalAllowanceThreshold.description: The threshold at which the annual personal allowance is reduced. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

reducedPersonalAllowance.title: Reduced Personal Allowance
reducedPersonalAllowance.description: The annual amount that the personal allowance is reduced to, if the income exceeds the personalAllowanceThreshold amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.

giftAidExtender.title: Gift Aid Extender
giftAidExtender.description: The amount by which the rate band thresholds are extended as a result of Gift Aid claimed against this tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.
